Class NotificationViewControllerMaster

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.masterController.NotificationViewControllerMaster
Direct Known Subclasses:
NotificationViewController, NotificationViewController
public abstract class NotificationViewControllerMaster extends Object
Abstract base controller class for managing the notification view. Provides common functionality for handling notifications and user interactions.

    • NotificationViewControllerMaster

      public NotificationViewControllerMaster()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the ComboBox and TableView. Logs the initialization process and handles shuttle selection changes.

    • loadTableContent

      public void loadTableContent()
      Loads the content of the notification table. Fetches notifications based on the selected shuttle and populates the table.

    • load

      protected abstract void load()
      Abstract method to load additional data or content. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific loading logic.

    • setupTableColumns

      protected void setupTableColumns()
      Sets up the columns of the notification table. Configures cell value factories and adjusts column properties.

    • setupTableErstellenContent

      protected abstract void setupTableErstellenContent()
      Abstract method to set up additional table content. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific logic for populating the table.

    • createIconButton

      protected javafx.scene.control.Button createIconButton(String iconFile)
      Creates a button with an SVG icon.
      Parameters:
      iconFile - The name of the SVG file to use as the button icon.
      Returns:
      The created Button object.

    • setViewManagerController

      public void setViewManagerController(ViewManagerController viewManagerController)
      Sets the ViewManagerController instance for managing the view.
      Parameters:
      viewManagerController - The ViewManagerController instance to set.

    • setClientRequests

      public void setClientRequests(ClientRequests clientRequests)
      Sets the ClientRequests instance for server communication. Loads shuttle and notification data and refreshes the view.
      Parameters:
      clientRequests - The ClientRequests instance to set.
